nodes.text: Fitca Prime was in the Fitca system. The planet was subjugated by then-Imperial Intelligence interrogator Mox Slosin. A number of Rebel agents tried to help the resistance on Fitca Prime, including Colonel Shanda Dok. Dok was captured and interrogated to death by Slosin, but never broke. Even after Dok's death, the Alliance provided a new support wave to Fitca Prime.
